name: Whole Wheat Vegan Couscous Salad
author: bekahc
summary: A delicious vegan salad of veggies and whole wheat couscous with a lemon basil vinaigrette. Feel free to add whatever vegetables you have in the fridge; the more the merrier!
ingredients: ½ cup finely chopped green onions
¼ cup finely chopped toasted walnuts
1 small bunch chopped fresh basil, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; remove from heat and stir in couscous
Cover saucepan and let stand until water is absorbed completely, about 10 minutes
Mix red onion, carrot, celery, cranberries, green onions, alfalfa sprouts, parsley, and walnuts into the couscous
Stir olive oil, apple cider vinegar, basil, and lemon juice together in a bowl
Stir in salt and black pepper
